Subject: Re: Protoform and Enemy attack?
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"Uppp ummm, well, it seems those days are gone. After you were scraped by
autobots, the Great war didnt last much longer. The Autobots won it"
Motormaster pauses to spit some oil in disgust. "Me and my comrades here
were taken prisoner, and locked up after a mockery trial stating our crimes
against Sentient beings. Now it is 300 years since that time. Autobots
descendants, Maximals, have made peace with the Decepticon descendants,
Predacons. and I HATE predacons, because they think they are Decepticons.
Well aparantly, a predacon rebel was causing problems in the time stream on
this planet. Planet Earth. The Tripredicus council, a powerful group of
predacon government on cybertron, has sent us here in hope that we stop
them from causing anymore problems. But they made a huge mistake. We will
rebuild the Decepticon Empire, take cybertron by force and rule the galaxy
again. But to do that we need troops, thats where you come in. Also, the
Decepticons of the past are hidden here somewhere, we will awaken them, and
hopefully Megatron, and rule the Galaxy".
